snippet.title: Soulvars - Official Xbox and PC Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Soulvars is a stylish pixel art deck-building RPG that combines turn-based combat with its innovative deck-building system to create dynamic and strategic battles. The game weaves a cautionary tale about the consequences of technological progress. As humans learn to transform Souls into digital form, grotesque beings known as Dominators appear to terrorize cities. Master the map layout, min-max the characters, and perfect your combos before confronting the daunting first boss. Check your score, RPG playstyle analysis, and clear time upon defeating it. Soulvars is available now on mobile and is launching on Xbox Series S|X and PC later this year.

#SoulVars #Xbox #PC
